attributes.action: Ban the showing of live competitive England matches on satellite televison, allowing them only to be shown on terrestrial televison.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the current crop of competitve England matches yet again being shown live on SKY TV, it is about time that the Government stop this, allowing these matches to be shown purely on terrestrial TV, and not leaving the terrestrial channels with the scraps and highlights that are left over.

Televison owners pay enough for their licence fees, and should not be expected to have to pay yet more money to have to watch their National team play their nations sport.
